1617950.name: Battle Force 2249
1617950.description:
BATTLE FORCE 2249 is a PvE shooter where your choices matter. Choose your weapons, plan your approach, and take on missions that will test your tactics, guts, and determination.

STORY

The galaxy has been ravaged by endless, senseless wars for as long as anyone alive can remember. Behind the chaos lies a sinister truth: humanity has been ensnared by a conspiracy — one designed to keep us divided, fighting, and dying, while a powerful caste of politicians, billionaires, and warlords reap the profits of our suffering.
Each of the four protagonists must uncover this brutal reality in their own way — and decide how far they’re willing to go to tear the system down.

CHARACTERS

Choose your path:

  • Pirate – Ruthless, resourceful, and driven by a code only they understand.

  • Diplomat – Skilled at negotiation and manipulation — words can be as deadly as weapons.

  • Disgraced – A former hero turned pariah, seeking redemption... or revenge.

  • Trader – A master of the market and the black market, weaponizing wealth and connections.

FEATURES

  • PvE: It's you versus the world. Hostile environments and dangerous enemies await — but sometimes, an unexpected ally might appear.

  • Questing:

    • Character-specific quests that reveal personal arcs.

    • Storyline quests driving the fight against the oligarchy.

    • Side quests and hidden missions.

    • Rewards vary: boost your stats, upgrade weapons, unlock new gear.

  • Inventory:

    • Customize your ship and loadout.

    • Build enemy-specific weapon profiles.

    • Collect complete sets of equipment for ultimate bonuses!

  • Boss Fights: Epic battles that test your gear, strategy, and reflexes.

  • Loot System: Find, earn, and craft powerful weapons and upgrades.

  • Raiding Zones: Open areas designed for exploration, grinding, and hunting for legendary loot.
